alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 2:53AM MST until February 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. For Bryce Canyon, total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. For south central Utah, total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Bryce Canyon Country and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From 8 PM today to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a burst of heavy snow overnight, likely exceeding one inch per hour rates, accompanied by gusty southerly winds up to 35 mph.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah
